hero.descriptionText: Yacht Ape is a collection of unique digital apes that you can own in NFT format

main.mainDescription: WHO GOT FED UP WITH BORING AND HYPOCRITIC COMMONPLACE THIS IS HOW THE IDEA OF ESCAPING AND DYNAMIC JOURNEY ON THE YACHT
main.additionalText: EACH ARTWORK IN THE COLLECTION TELLS A STORY OF ONE JOURNEY. ARTS ARE RANDOMLY GENERATED BY USERS
